srl.corpus
Class StandardSplitter

java.lang.Object
  srl.corpus.StandardSplitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Splitter
public class StandardSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Splitter

Sentence splitter implementation. This is loosely based on the one used in GATE only with some common sense applied.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String[] englishAbbrevs
          A list of abbreviations commonly found with full stops after them like "Prof."

Method Detail

split

public java.util.List<SrlDocument> split(java.lang.String string,
                                         java.lang.String docName)
Split a string into sentences. Uses srl.corpus.token.StandardTokenizer for tokenization but includes whitespace as is.

Specified by:
split in interface Splitter
Parameters:
string - The document
docName - Documents like to have names, like dogs
Returns:
The tokens split into sentences
See Also:
StandardTokenizer#tokenize(String)

Specified by:
